main event: Approximately 300 persons observed a round shiny object hovering in the sky over Atlantic City, New Jersey on 29 July 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for a long period with no significant performance characteristics observed., The object was speculated to be an experimental balloon launched on 27 July 1954., The report received attention from various authorities, including the Director of Intelligence., The original balloon was launched in Minneapolis, MN and sighted over Atlantic City, NJ., Weather plotting charts were included to provide further context to the sighting.
witness description: individuals in the Atlantic City area
